chapters.title: Chapter 7: Pitfalls and Tripwires
chapters.info: High Lord Weiramon Saniago, p. 154 (187)—A High Lord of Tear. Rand placed him in charge of his campaigns in Cairhien at first. He now controls part of the massive army Rand plans to send against Illian. His sign is a silver Crescent-and-stars. Rand's only description of him is “a buffoon.”
